comments.author: Greg
comments.body: Guys! It's 37 degrees. Yikes. I'll be running and looking to sweep your frozen bodies off the road somewhere around Chataqua.

comments.author: Steve
comments.body: Au contraire, Greg! Since the sun broke out, Mesa Lab temps have skyrocketed! It's now [45Â° F](http://tinyurl.com/yj2ffw) up high!!

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: _Your share of Dave time?_ You should be so lucky. I just took one of those self-assessment surveys in the new Reader's Digest, and, based on the results, I'm due for an upgrade. According to the test, one of the reasons I'm falling behind in so many areas (hygiene, common sense, hygiene) is that I'm imprinting on the wrong people (read: Frenz). JG, though unfortunately currently at odds with the Colorado criminal justice system, is helping me get my mind up off the carpet and back in working oder. This is a slow process, but she appears to have infinite patience. Today we discussed Voltaire and something else about Spain. (Or was it France?) DU
